If the latter, how did you pick the maximum speed? It’s possible that some of your modules are not quite capable of the speed you’re commanding.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAlso, you should check (e.g. using a dashboard) whether the modules believe that they are achieving the target speed. Also check whether some modules are taking more current than others.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eYou should double check your \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCAN\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Controller Area Network\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e ids for motors and (if applicable) encoders, and the signs on the kinematic coordinates. If they are switched, then you might see this sort of thing happenning when driving
